QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: videoSource
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Source for video. UDP, TCP, RTSP and UVC Cameras may be supported depending on Vehicle and ground station version.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: udpUrl
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: UDP url address and port to bind to for video stream. Example: 0.0.0.0:5600

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: rtspUrl
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: RTSP url address and port to bind to for video stream. Example: rtsp://192.168.42.1:554/live

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: rtsp1Url
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: RTSP1 url address and port to bind to for video stream. Example: rtsp://192.168.42.1:554/live

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: rtsp1Ip
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: IP address of the RTSP1 video stream source.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: rtsp1StreamNo
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Stream channel number of the RTSP1 video stream source.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: rtsp2Url
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: RTSP2 url address and port to bind to for video stream. Example: rtsp://192.168.42.1:554/live

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: rtsp2Ip
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: IP address of the RTSP2 video stream source.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: rtsp2StreamNo
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Stream channel number of the RTSP2 video stream source.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: rtsp3Url
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: RTSP3 url address and port to bind to for video stream. Example: rtsp://192.168.42.1:554/live

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: rtsp3Ip
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: IP address of the RTSP3 video stream source.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: rtsp3StreamNo
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Stream channel number of the RTSP3 video stream source.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: rtsp4Url
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: RTSP4 url address and port to bind to for video stream. Example: rtsp://192.168.42.1:554/live

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: rtsp4Ip
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: IP address of the RTSP4 video stream source.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: rtsp4StreamNo
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Stream channel number of the RTSP4 video stream source.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: rtsp5Url
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: RTSP5 url address and port to bind to for video stream. Example: rtsp://192.168.42.1:554/live

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: rtsp5Ip
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: IP address of the RTSP5 video stream source.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: rtsp5StreamNo
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Stream channel number of the RTSP5 video stream source.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: rtsp6Url
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: RTSP6 url address and port to bind to for video stream. Example: rtsp://192.168.42.1:554/live

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: rtsp6Ip
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: IP address of the RTSP6 video stream source.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: rtsp6StreamNo
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Stream channel number of the RTSP6 video stream source.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: rtsp7Url
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: RTSP7 url address and port to bind to for video stream. Example: rtsp://192.168.42.1:554/live

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: rtsp7Ip
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: IP address of the RTSP7 video stream source.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: rtsp7StreamNo
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Stream channel number of the RTSP7 video stream source.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: rtsp8Url
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: RTSP8 url address and port to bind to for video stream. Example: rtsp://192.168.42.1:554/live

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: rtsp8Ip
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: IP address of the RTSP8 video stream source.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: rtsp8StreamNo
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Stream channel number of the RTSP8 video stream source.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: rtsp9Url
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: RTSP9 url address and port to bind to for video stream. Example: rtsp://192.168.42.1:554/live

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: rtsp9Ip
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: IP address of the RTSP9 video stream source.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: rtsp9StreamNo
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Stream channel number of the RTSP9 video stream source.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: rtsp10Url
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: RTSP10 url address and port to bind to for video stream. Example: rtsp://192.168.42.1:554/live

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: rtsp10Ip
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: IP address of the RTSP10 video stream source.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: rtsp10StreamNo
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Stream channel number of the RTSP10 video stream source.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: tcpUrl
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: TCP url address and port to bind to for video stream. Example: 192.168.143.200:3001

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: videoSavePath
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Directory to save videos to.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: aspectRatio
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Video Aspect Ratio (width / height). Use 0.0 to ignore it.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: gridLines
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Displays a grid overlaid over the video view.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: videoFit
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Handle Video Aspect Ratio.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: showRecControl
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Show recording control in the UI.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: recordingFormat
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Video recording file format.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: maxVideoSize
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Maximum amount of disk space used by video recording.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: enableStorageLimit
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: When enabled, old video files will be auto-deleted when the total size of QGC-recorded video exceeds the maximum video storage usage.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: rtspTimeout
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: How long to wait before assuming RTSP link is gone.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: rtsp1Timeout
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: How long to wait before assuming RTSP1 link is gone.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: rtsp2Timeout
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: How long to wait before assuming RTSP2 link is gone.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: rtsp3Timeout
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: How long to wait before assuming RTSP3 link is gone.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: rtsp4Timeout
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: How long to wait before assuming RTSP4 link is gone.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: rtsp5Timeout
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: How long to wait before assuming RTSP5 link is gone.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: rtsp6Timeout
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: How long to wait before assuming RTSP6 link is gone.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: rtsp7Timeout
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: How long to wait before assuming RTSP7 link is gone.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: rtsp8Timeout
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: How long to wait before assuming RTSP8 link is gone.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: rtsp9Timeout
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: How long to wait before assuming RTSP9 link is gone.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: rtsp10Timeout
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: How long to wait before assuming RTSP10 link is gone.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: streamEnabled
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Start/Stop Video Stream.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: disableWhenDisarmed
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Disable Video Stream when disarmed.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: lowLatencyMode
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: If this option is enabled, the rtpjitterbuffer is removed and the video sink is set to assynchronous mode, reducing the latency by about 200 ms.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: forceVideoDecoder
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Force specific category of video decode
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Force the change of prioritization between video decode methods, allowing the user to force some video hardware decode plugins if necessary.
QGC.MetaData.Facts.enumStrings: Default,Force software decoder,Force NVIDIA decoder,Force VA-API decoder,Force DirectX3D 11 decoder,Force VideoToolbox decoder,Force Intel decoder,Force Vulkan decoder
